titleStmt.title: George R. Grinstead to James F. Robinson
CWG7698

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Palls Metcalfe Co Ky Aug 24th ^1862^
to the Governer of Ky
Dear sir I herewith respectfuly tender my resignation as Captain of Company No 2 of the 1st Battallion of state Militias of Metcalfe County Ky

Referred to Secretary Wickliffe with the opinion that the resignation be not accepted.
Jno. W. Finnell
Adj Genl

Executive Dept of Ky
Louisville
Sept. 10. 62
The Governor regrets exceedingly that he can not dispense with the valuable services of Capt. Grinstead, in the present crisis --

By order of the Governor
D. C. Wickliffe,
Sec. of State

Jno B. Jn. B, Huston
Jno B. Huston.
J. W. Finnell
D.. C.. Wickliffe
D C Wickliffe
